name: Slave Master: The Game
publisher: The Black Jester and Realm of the Mental Midget Slayer
description: Sado Masso is on a twisted quest against hostile entities and to seek out supreme dominance and toxic masculinity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32 Bit) Processor: Dual Core AMG Turion Memory: 6 MB RAM Graphics: Most since 2010 Storage: 500 MB MB available space Sound Card: Most Modern Additional Notes: The range is as tested, any comparible machines should work.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (32 or 64 Bit) Processor: AMD A10-9600P Quad Core Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: Radion R 5 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Most Modern Additional Notes: The range is as tested, any comparible machines should work.
